meaningMnemonic: In the <radical>dirt</radical> there are <radical>flag</radical>s and <radical>horns</radical> lined up with a <radical>lantern</radical> attached to them, making a <kanji>fence</kanji>. It's a little weird looking, but these things are definitely supposed to fence something in.
readingMnemonic: You want to know what this <kanji>fence</kanji> is fencing in, so you take a step closer. As the light from the lantern gets brighter you see that the fence is around a ton of <reading>hay</reading> (へい).
